body: The nagaji's gaze is so intense it stops others in their tracks. Once per day, it can attempt to hypnotize a single target, as per the spell hypnotism (caster level equal to the nagaji's Hit Dice). The DC of this effect is equal to 11 + the nagaji's Charisma modifier. The effects of the hypnotic gaze only last a single round. This racial trait replaces serpent's sense.
name: Hypnotic Gaze (Sp)
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Nagaji/Alternate Racial Traits/Hypnotic Gaze (Sp)
